verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice, And it told Thy love to me; But I long to rise in the arms of faith, And be closer drawn to Thee.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord, To the cross where Thou hast died; Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord, To Thy precious, bleeding side.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Consecrate me now to Thy service, Lord, By the powâ€™r of grace divine; Let my soul look up with a steadfast hope, And my will be lost in Thine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O the pure delight of a single hour That before Thy throne I spend, When I kneel in prayer, and with Thee, my God, I commune as friend with friend!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There are depths of love that I yet may know Till Thee face to face I see; There are heights of joy that I yet may reach Till I rest in peace with Thee.
